featured.text: During World War II, Norway was occupied by the Nazis.

definition.zh_def: 納粹黨的成員，特指在1933年至1945年間在德國執政的極端民族主義和反猶太主義政黨的追隨者。
definition.en_def: Members of the National Socialist German Workers' Party, known for their extreme nationalism and anti-Semitism, who ruled Germany from 1933 to 1945.
definition.example: The Nazis implemented policies that led to the devastation of millions of lives during World War II.
